title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.237 - Retirement of indebtedness funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.237 - Retirement of indebtedness funds

State Regulations

Funds required by external sources to be used to meet
debt-service charges and the retirement of indebtedness on plant assets. The
term sinking funds is sometimes used to describe these funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.237

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
